name: Find all MIs with an Entra ID role

queryList.query: MATCH (node) WHERE (node:_VAR_managed-identities-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (node)-[:AZHasRole]->(:AZRole) RETURN p

name: Find all MIs with a Tier-0 application permission

queryList.query: MATCH (node) WHERE (node:_VAR_managed-identities-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (node)-[t0:_VAR_all-entra-app-permissions-in-t0]->(n) RETURN p

name: Find all MIs with a Tier-1 application permission

queryList.query: MATCH (node) WHERE (node:_VAR_managed-identities-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (node)-[t1:_VAR_all-entra-app-permissions-in-t1]->(n) RETURN p

name: Find all MIs with Azure permissions on Management Groups

queryList.query: MATCH (node) WHERE (node:_VAR_managed-identities-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (node)-[r]->(:AZManagementGroup) RETURN p

name: Find all MIs with Azure permissions on Subscriptions

queryList.query: MATCH (node) WHERE (node:_VAR_managed-identities-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (node)-[r]->(:AZSubscription) RETURN p

name: Find all MIs with Azure permissions on Resource Groups

queryList.query: MATCH (node) WHERE (node:_VAR_managed-identities-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (node)-[r]->(:AZResourceGroup) RETURN p

name: Find all MIs with Azure permissions on individual resources

queryList.query: MATCH (node) WHERE (node:_VAR_all-az-resources) MATCH (node) WHERE (node:_VAR_managed-identities-excluding-built-in) MATCH p = (node)-[r]->(node) RETURN p
